Quickstrike charged another blast in his snake mouth "So we be 
wasting time?" 

Waspinator manovered around the blasts putting all he had into his 
wings to get back to the predacon base.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron's energon bladed axe comes out of subspace, and he uses 
the 
> flat of the axe to barely catch Hot Rod's blade, deflecting the 
> powerful swing downward and to the right possibly putting Hot Rod 
> off balance.
> 
> He leaps backwards, and fire two plasma blasts with his other 
hand's 
> weapon at Hot Rod then replies to Quickstrike, "The Predacons were 
> supposed to cover my retreat, which was sucessful I might add, but 
I 
> decided to come back and punish a Maximal for firing upon me," his 
> indicates Hot Rod with his Axe, "I chose this one. Unfortunately, 
we 
> will likely have to retreat soon, having accomplished our mission."
> 
> > "yo boss, do ya have a plan or do we just shoot them all?" 
> > Quickstrike asked Megatron while a venom blast at Kup.
